content:
$35 USD per pet per night, maximum of 2 pets under 40 lbs are permitted per room. Please contact the property in advance for pet charges and restrictions. A refundable security deposit and taxable nightly fee applies. Subject to change at any time.

*Effective July 1, 2018, an Amenity Fee charge of $25 USD plus tax per room per night will be collected upon arrival.  Charge and inclusions are subject to change at any time without notice.
